INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The flaws in the commitment of decision-making in emergency situations and the lack of perception related to all elements associated with a given situation in a short space of time indicate, often, lack of situational awareness. Automation always surprises the crews and often prevents them from understanding the extent of this technology that is very common in
aircraft units with a high degree of automation. These facts are discussed in a subtle way by aircraft drivers who can not do it openly, as it might create an impression of professional self-worthlessness (self-deprecation). This leads to common questions like: What is happening now? What will be the next step of automated systems? This type of doubt would be inadmissible in older aircraft because the pilot of those machines works as an extension of the plane. This scenario contributes to emotional disorders and a growing hidden problem in the aeronautical field. These unexpected automation surprises reflect a complete misunderstanding or even the misinformation of the users. It also reveals their inability and limitations to overcome these new situations that were not foreseen by the aircraft designers. Our studies showed a different scenario when the accident is correlated
with systemic variables. It has identified the problems or errors that contribute to the fact that drivers are unable to act properly. These vectors, when they come together, may generate eventually a temporary incompetence of the pilot due to limited capacity
or lack of training in the appropriateness of automation in aircraft or even, the worst alternative, due to a personal not visible and not detectable non-adaptation to automation. We must also consider in the analysis the inadequate training and many other reasons, so that we can put in right proportion the effective participation or culpability of the pilot in accidents. Our doctoral thesis presents statistical studies that allow us to assert that the emotional and cognitive ove

The FAA?s investigation has used pilot error as a stopping point; the human is at fault, thus train the human ? more currency. This simplistic approach may miss underlying problems, and until these and the contributing factors are understood then any meaningful intervention cannot be formulated.
Training standards and currency in manual flying skills may well have deteriorated, but are these changes in proportion to the tasks and situations typical of modern operations, or really at the root of handling related safety concerns. What about the organization, economic, and social changes; has the baseline human behavior been affected by these.
Modern views of human factors by-pass human error with the concept of variability; this is a performance characteristic necessary to manage daily activities. No situation is perfect / clear cut, work activity is a compromise. So one aspect to consider is if pilots are sufficiently trained / skilled in the process of compromise ? the judgment that originates from situation assessment and choice of action (aspects of airmanship), and which also involves risk management, and the skills of thought when stressed.
This thread talks about manual handling errors. But it's not about "faults". It?s more about lack of being able to fulfill the role the human still has his place in the cockpit: 
To take over when the electrons go the wrong way.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
no consegui inserir o doi no lates
**************************************
Advances in technology have enabled increasingly sophisticated automation to be introduced into the flight decks of modern airplanes. Generally, this automation was added to accomplish worthy objectives such as reducing flightcrew workload, adding additional capability, or increasing fuel economy. To a large extent, these objectives have been achieved. Safety also stood to benefit from the increasing amounts of highly reliable automation. Indeed, the current generation of highly automated transport category airplanes has generally demonstrated an improved safety record relative to the previous generation of airplanes. Vulnerabilities do exist, though, and further safety improvements should be made. To provide a safety target to guide the aviation industry, the Secretary of Transportation and others have expressed the view that the aviation industry should strive for the objective of none accidents. Training standards and currency in manual flying skills may well have deteriorated, but are these changes in proportion to the tasks and situations typical of modern operations, or really at the root of handling related safety concerns.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Guilt! : A word which disrupts accident investigations. In the scenario of aircraft with high degree of automation control which resembles computer consoles, point to the need for further research focused on possible conflicts between the "human logic" and "logical automation" checked in control systems for aircraft. 
It is very important to consider that the logic of automation was also drafted by pilots, so that this assumption is difficult to validate. A pilot in command of the Airbus blurted that "modern technology was withdrawing men of cockpits. This happened with the radio-telegraph when they got the new communication systems called SSB and VHF. But from there, the pilots were more burdened with the task of transmitting operational information and logistics companies, diluting attention at critical moments of the flight, in congested terminal areas. Also happened with the navigator when new systems arise like Omega and Doppler Radar. Over a sequence of operations adjustments and manipulations more equipment were transferred to the pilots on this occasion, adding to the known and the complex and overloaded duties of these professionals. This also happened with the mechanics of flight (the third man in the cockpit), when computers arrived. Until the 70s there was a work station flight engineer.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
NO SEI O DOI
Comparative studies aim to identify, describe and evaluate conceptual and technological innovations focused on the continuous training of students with emphasis on distance education methodologies and tools. The learning process in web-based instructional models becomes a complex commitment to educator, just as the blackboard and the chalk paradigm had been in the past, when the blackboard and chalk were deemed the formal means of transfer of knowledge between the professor and the student in the traditional school environment. Breaking this paradigm is just the initial step to accept the "Invisible School" and the "remote" teacher, who can be "turned on and off" by the students, according to their time constraints and learning conveniences, which are as flexible as the selection of roadmaps on the development of the curriculum frameworks of what should be learned, and where to learn, with whom to learn and when to learn. Some Distance Education environments are being designed by web-designers and html language programmers, and it is expected that the final product, besides presenting a friendly interface and pleasant visual, can also present a pedagogical environment and ergonomic relationships with its users.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The reading of information in a book replaced by the reading on a display represents the mere replacement of the boredom of reading books by reading on video. The constructivist philosophy of learning defines the cognitive process as the internal construction of the knowledge in terms of long-term memory, with the personal knowledge built through experience and interaction with the world, which he called active learning. Upon replacing the traditional technology of the "Computer-Teacher" binominal, where human contact is lost, students are isolated and the educational experience is passive, limited and alienated by environments where the WEB represents the means of interaction, enabling research and consultation of information and interaction with tutors and fellow students. The role of the teacher and inflexible rigid teaching methods has been questioned by educators who advocate cooperative learning, as opposed to the dictatorship of tax knowledge, practiced by traditionalists who believe that teaching authority, and assimilation of knowledge for apprentices are necessarily two sides of the same coin.

The role of the teacher and inflexible rigid teaching methods has been questioned by educators who advocate cooperative learning, as opposed to the dictatorship of tax knowledge, practiced by traditionalists who believe that teaching authority, and assimilation of knowledge for apprentices are necessarily two sides of the same coin.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O DOI INFORMADO PELO SPOLM :
DOI: 10.5151/marine-spolm2014-126677 ? http://blucherproceedings.com.br/articles/details/6819 
This paper provides a classification of violence in Brazilian cities, treating homicide rates related to population, grouping processed using neural networks results. The source data include indicators of homicides per 100,000 inhabitants, referring to the Brazilian capitals, edited by the Ministry of Health (2003) and demographic indexes disclosed by the IBGE (2010). The ultimate vision of the study will be the result of treatment of the variables processed via neural network, using SOM (Self Organized Method) Competitive Learning architecture, gathering the capitals in four clusters. A original method to extract organizational samples plotted on trigonometric space was used..
Using a trigonometric circle as a classification environment (hyperspace), the variables were distributed in the quadrants of the hyperspace where, after processing of the neural algorithm, centroids (neurons) best representative of capitals in each respective quadrant were generated. Quantities identified as "Large", "Small", "High" or "Low" are references without intermediate variations or sub-classifications, without restrictions imposed only for the of this essay purposes. The final results of this test were as follows (the references presented in these final results are relative and particularly restricted):
Quadrant 1 Populational - large (+) Homicides - large (+)	 	Quadrant 2 Populational - large (+) Homicides - few (-)
 As a result of this study, was offered a classification of violence in Brazilian cities, treating related homicide rates in the population, gathering processed through neural networks results. The source data were represented by indicators of homicides per 100,000 inhabitants, referring to the Brazilian capitals, edited by the Ministry of Health (2003) and demographic indexes disclosed by the IBGE

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este trabalho resgata as origens tcnicas e histricas que induziram a sociedade a construir regras que formalizam as responsabilidades dos profissionais da aviao e discute sua tarefa sob uma tica sistmica multidisciplinar. Os trabalhadores da aviao tm sido permanentemente submetidos aos resultados de projetos que adotam a tecnologia da informao em escala crescente mas, que produzem perda de confiana nos novos artefatos pelos pilotos, gerando nestes dvidas e incertezas quanto aos resultados prometidos na operao das novas aeronaves. Nos ltimos tempos os fabricantes esto introduzindo, em nome da automao, tarefas que no se vinculam a preceitos ergonmicos como seria necessrio, particularmente no tocante ergonomia informacional. Este tipo de negligncia, quase invisvel, se instala em nome do lucro em primeiro lugar, atrelada s duras e implacveis regras trabalhistas de toda a sociedade. Esse problema, muito frequentemente, pode causar disfunes operacionais nos aeronautas enquanto executam suas tarefas em vo. Neste contexto sistmico ainda se somam as invisveis tenses trabalhistas e sociais.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Este trabalho resgata as origens tcnicas e histricas que induziram a sociedade a construir regras que formalizam as responsabilidades dos profissionais da aviao e discute sua tarefa sob uma tica sistmica multidisciplinar. Os trabalhadores da aviao tm sido permanentemente submetidos aos resultados de projetos que adotam a tecnologia da informao em escala crescente mas, que produzem perda de confiana nos novos artefatos pelos pilotos, gerando nestes dvidas e incertezas quanto aos resultados prometidos na operao das novas aeronaves. Nos ltimos tempos os fabricantes esto introduzindo, em nome da automao, tarefas que no se vinculam a preceitos ergonmicos como seria necessrio, particularmente no tocante ergonomia informacional. Este tipo de negligncia, quase invisvel, se instala em nome do lucro em primeiro lugar, atrelada s duras e implacveis regras trabalhistas de toda a sociedade. Esse problema, muito frequentemente, pode causar disfunes operacionais nos aeronautas enquanto executam suas tarefas em vo. Neste contexto sistmico ainda se somam as invisveis tenses trabalhistas e sociais.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Advances in Usability Evaluation Part II
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Francesco Rebelo, CIPER - Technical University of Lisbon, Dafundo, Portugal; Marcelo M. Soares, Federal University of Pernambuco, Brazil
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: CRC press Taylor and Francis Group

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Successful interaction with products, tools and technologies depends on usable designs, accommodating the needs of potential users and does not require costly training. In this context, this book is concerned about emerging concepts, theories and applications of human factors knowledge focusing on the discovery and understanding of human interaction with products and systems for their improvement.
The book is organized into four sections that focus on the following subject matters:
? Usability Methods and Tools
? Theoretical Issues in Usability
? Usability in Web Environment
? Miscellaneous
In the section Usability Methods and Tools, studies related with new and improved methods and tools for the advancement in the efficiency of the usability studies is reported. In this context, this book provides studies, which cover everything from checklists and heuristics development to kaizen and biometrics measurement techniques. Also, the use of tools, like eye tracker, virtual reality and augmented reality is discussed.
The section Theoretical Issues in Usability concentrates on theorical approaches of usability that allow justifying the impact of usability in our lives. Review studies about the importance of usability and connections between ergonomics and virtual reality were reported. General approaches raised the concepts of modeling and simulation to explain changes in human performance and accidents.
The section Usability in Web Environment concentrates on studies associated with the use of the Internet environment and mainly discusses the development of new services and creates social communities. The section Miscellaneous shows various studies that focus on aesthetic, affective and emotional design, corporate and inclusive design.

Series Title Lecture Notes in Computer Science

Publisher Springer International Publishing
Advances in technology have enabled increasingly sophisticated au-tomation to be introduced into the flight decks of modern airplanes. Generally, this automation was added to accomplish worthy objectives such as reducing flightcrew workload, adding additional capability, or increasing fuel economy. To a large extent, these objectives have been achieved. Safety also stood to benefit from the increasing amounts of highly reliable automation. Indeed, the current generation of highly automated transport category airplanes has general-ly demonstrated an improved safety record relative to the previous generation of airplanes. Vulnerabilities do exist, though, and further safety improvements should be made. To provide a safety target to guide the aviation industry, the Secretary of Transportation and others have expressed the view that the aviation industry should strive for the objective of none accidents. Training standards and currency in manual flying skills may well have deteriorated, but are these changes in proportion to the tasks and situations typical of modern operations, or really at the root of handling related safety concerns
The FAA?s investigation has used pilot error as a stopping point; the human is at fault, thus train the human ? more currency. This simplistic approach may miss underlying problems, and until these and the contributing factors are understood then any meaningful intervention cannot be formulated.
Training standards and currency in manual flying skills may well have deteriorated, but are these changes in proportion to the tasks and situations typical of modern oper

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Este ensaio oferece uma classificao da violncia nas capitais brasileiras, tratando ndices de homicdios relacionados com a populao, agrupando os resultados processados por meio de redes neurais. Os dados fonte compreendem indicadores de homicdios por 100.000 mil habitantes, referentes s capitais brasileiras, editados pelo Ministrio da Sade (ano 2000) e os ndices demogrficos divulgados pelo IBGE (ano 2003). O viso final do estudo ser o resultado do tratamento das variveis processadas via rede neural, utilizando uma arquitetura SOM (Self Organized Method) Aprendizado Competitivo, agrupando as capitais em quatro clusters. Foi desenvolvido um mtodo para extrao de amostras organizacionais plotadas em espao trigonomtrico, complementado por algoritmo de classificao de estruturas que utilizam modelos de redes neurais com aprendizado no-supervisionado SOM.Um mtodo para classificao de subgrupos conhecido como como mapas auto organizveis analisa configuraes organizacionais de informaes, aplicando tcnicas de classificao no supervisionada de dados, atravs de uma ferramenta que utilizando princpios de redes neurais. Este mtodo trata informaes no organizadas de entrada, desconhecendo-se possveis classes ou padres organizacionais referentes aos dados selecionados. Um destes mtodos denominado SOM - Self Organized Maps que aplica algoritmos de auto aprendizagem no supervisionada, onde neurnios competem pela descoberta de padres de entrada em um mtodo conhecido como Aprendizado Competitivo, uma forma de aprendizado onde o conjunto de padres de entrada particionado em grupos especficos que constituem uma forma simplificada denominada Winner takes all. (o ganhador leva tudo).
O objetivo deste algoritmo, orientado para aprendizagem auto organizada, descobrir padres significativos ou caractersticas nos dados de entrada, desenvolvendo descobertas sem auxlio de um professor. Para desenvolver a aprendizagem, o algoritmo dispe de um

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The accepted full-papers will be included in a book to be published by Taylor & Francis Group (submitted to be indexed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index, and Elsevier/Scopus). Occupational safety and hygiene III ? CRC PRESS TAYLOR AND FRANCIS GROUP- LONDON- ISBN- 978-1-138-02765-7 
Guilt is a word which disrupts accident investigations. In the scenario of aircraft with high degree of automation control which resembles computer consoles, point to the need for further research focused on possible conflicts between the "human logic" and "logical automation" checked in control systems for aircraft. It is very important to consider that the logic of automation was also drafted by pilots, so that this assumption is difficult to validate. A pilot in command of the Airbus blurted that "modern technology was withdrawing men of cockpits. This happened with the radio-telegraph when they got the new communication systems called SSB and VHF. But from there, the pilots were more burdened with the task of transmitting operational information and logistics companies, diluting attention at critical moments of the flight, in congested terminal areas

 Portugal @ http://www.sposho.pt/sho2015/
 PROCEEDINGS of the Occupational safety and hygiene ? SOCIEDADE PORTUGUESA DE SEGURANA E HIGIENE OCUPACIONAIS ? MINHO-PORTUGAL ISBN- 978-989-98203-3-3 
Training standards in manual flying skills may have deteriorated, but are these some changes in the tasks and scenery on typical of modern operations even in the reality at the spirit of handling related safety con-cerns. The organisation of the economic and the social changes have changed the baseline human behaviour that has been affected by these. Modern views of human factors by-pass human error with the concept of variability; this is a performance characteristic necessary to manage daily activities. No situation is perfect / clear cut, work activity is a compromise. So one aspect to consider is if pilots are sufficiently trained / skilled in the process of compromise ? the judgement that originates from situation assessment and choice of action (aspects of airmanship), and which also involves risk management, and the skills of thought when stressed.

Isnard Thomas Martins, Edgard Thomas Martins and Laura Bezerra Martins
Os Objetos de Aprendizagem e a Capacitao em Mquinas Complexas Sho 2015. SOCIEDADE PORTUGUESA DE SEGURANA E HIGIENE 
 OCUPACIONAIS ? MINHO-PORTUGAL ISBN- 978-989-98203-3-3 
There are situations in the operation of complex machinery which is significant the pressure. It is often necessary to capture, interpret and process control instruments of information in just seconds. This occurs on the work station where operates the pilot and the aircraft will be established a set of operations that will culminate with a maneuver, consisting of a substantial and binding set of procedures performed by him. This worker has little time to evaluate and act, supported by aircraft instruments and external environmental signals captured by the senses, which will stimulate conditioned actions that, if executed without due accuracy, is reflected in a deadly mistake. These situations cause an emotional state of tension and unpredictability, especially when it happens bad weather and / or no visibility and bad wind conditions

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The Two machines: The Human and the Computer, one biological and other mechanical/ electronics that use and implement their natural computational logic in sharing the tasks for controlling complex machines. Both components (Human and Computer) in charge of the control and operation of complex machines need to learn their tasks each in its own way. But questions arise: The format of the training, learning objects and the training process are correct? The operationalization of the knowledge showed satisfactory? This article presents a critical analysis of learning processes and the operation for the joint work of these two components, where supposedly the symbiosis in the distribution of tasks is proposed to extract the greatest advantages of each process. The great advantage of man associated with the computer appears as a large capacity for recognition and processing qualitative information, that is often not covered in computer systems with their great ability to process a large amount of data very fast and accurate.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The reading of information in a book replaced by the reading on a display represents the mere replacement of the boredom of reading books by reading on video. The constructivist philosophy of learning defines the cognitive process as the internal construction of the knowledge in terms of long-term memory, with the personal knowledge built through experience and interaction with the world, which he called active learning. Upon replacing the traditional technology of the "Computer-Teacher" binominal, where human contact is lost, students are isolated and the educational experience is passive, limited and alienated by environments where the WEB represents the means of interaction, enabling research and consultation of information and interaction with tutors and fellow students. The role of the teacher and inflexible rigid teaching methods has been questioned by educators who advocate cooperative learning, as opposed to the dictatorship of tax knowledge, practiced by traditionalists who believe that teaching authority, and assimilation of knowledge for apprentices are necessarily two sides of the same coin.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Many gynecological disorders happen with their effects on the ability to fly. Since 1784, personified by Elizabeth Thible using a Montgolfier balloon, in Lyon, France demonstrates that the woman will fly but she knew, probably, the general opinion at the time, that aviation was a male activity. Aviation science has evolved and many of the pioneering achievements of female aviation have been viewed with skepticism, contempt and intended as ridiculous. Men have invented many reasons that reflect a lack of knowledge of female anatomy, physiology and psychology to alienate women a more active participation in aviation. However, hundreds of women stood in aviation. A well-known aviation: the North American pilot Amelia Earhart. She becomes the first woman (and second person) to fly alone across the Atlantic Ocean in her Lockheed Vega and the first person to cross the Atlantic twice by air.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Develop housing projects, leisure and work has been a major feature in the specialized tasks of ergonomics. Some of the basic human characteristics are associated with the size and range of motion of various parts of your body. Ergonomics is aware of these features work in aircraft design and accommodation of passengers environments that have very different physical characteristics. Adopt adjustments solutions in aircraft seats exacerbates the challenge of responsibility to ergonomically design these complex artifacts. Not always the providences for accessibility are synchronized to safety. For example, the huge doors of access for large aircraft, designed for loading and unloading very fast loads, have caused situations where the lock is not perfect and therefore, there have been accidents. The design of many aircraft equipment uses the dimensions of the male human-being: life jackets, emergency exits, oxygen masks, snack service cart, bathroom sinks, belts and so on, because after all the human is its purpose. On-site installation of these devices, knowledge of the size, weight, users of the scale is needed to determine accessibility.

Blucher Engineering Proceedings
O ISSN : 2357-7592 mas o sistema no aceita
http://www.proceedings.blucher.com.br/issue-list/engineeringproceedings-41/list 
A history of aircraft can mean loss of life if there is any issue that was not previously detected by a thorough assessment tool, efficient, continuous and complete, based on technical and ergonomic criteria. Thus, it can be taken as an example, the Brazilian government takeover of the Argentine airline Aero Boero AB-115 (Figure 1), based on criteria that were not considered all the technical aspects as determinants for use by all national aero clubs. The choice of an aircraft can not be regarded merely subjective or political criteria. In addition AeroBoero AB-115, we have two other examples of training aircraft used in Brazilian air clubs: Neiva Paulistinha P-56 (Figure 2) and Cessna 150 (Figure 3). The latter, unlike the former, has a reputation in the aviation environment as performing well in terms of safety, performance and applicability in basic training area pilots.

Rua Pedroso Alvarenga 1245 4 andar - So Paulo, SP 04531-012
Telefone: (11) 3078 - 5366 
The aeronauts procedures has undergone profound changes, following new technologies requiring complicated security and control efforts increasingly supported by computerized systems. Technicians, maintenance engineers, human factors managers and people, baggage handlers, large aircraft displacement process in the ground movement are components that keep new aircraft flying safely operating schedules increasingly critical. New procedures appear every moment resulting from new technologies and from accidents / incidents and necessary for the optimization of material and human resources. The management scenario needs different tools of linear and traditional planning. One solution: situational planning and programming.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Copyright 2014 - Editora Blucher Todos os direitos reservados
Rua Pedroso Alvarenga 1245 4 andar - So Paulo, SP 04531-012
Telefone: (11) 3078 - 5366 
A tarefa de aeronautas sofreu profundas alteraes, acompanhando novas tecnologias exigindo complicadas aes de segurana e controle crescentemente apoiadas em sistemas computadorizados. Tcnicos, engenheiros de manuteno, gestores de fatores humanos e pessoas, carregamento e deslocamento de grandes aeronaves no solo, integram o processo que sustentam as aeronaves voando em segurana em cronogramas de operao cada vez mais crticos. Novos procedimentos surgem a cada instante conseqentes de novas tecnologias, e resultantes de acidentes/incidentes e necessrios otimizao de recursos materiais e humanos. A gesto do cenrio precisa de instrumentos diferentes do planejamento linear e normativo. Uma soluo: Planejamento e Programao Situacional.

Observamos o efeito do conhecimento sobre a identificao e sobre o controle dos riscos quando o comportamento do trabalhador realiza prticas seguras no ambiente de trabalho. O intuito reduzir a probabilidade de eventos adversos e no planejadas. Podem ser estabelecidas aes especficas e direcionadas para preveno de acidentes com a identificao de fatores cognitivos que contribuem mais fortemente para o comportamento humano durante a execuo de atividades no trabalho, fazendo com que o trabalhador evite a repetio de acidente na mesma parte do corpo anteriormente envolvida, e tambm para evitar o envolvimento de outras partes do corpo em novos acidentes.

The increase in the number of accidents and removal jobs of workers contributes to increased cost of production, made entrepreneurs start thinking about how to manage and enable focused way of working on the causes involved. The need for companies to seek the reduction and / or elimination of accidents. Considering ergonomics aiming to modify work systems to suit existing activity to the characteristics, abilities and limitations of people with a view to its efficient performance, comfortable and safe, entrepreneurs consider the application of ergonomics, even if incipient.

O aumento no nmero de acidentes de trabalho e afastamento de trabalhadores de postos de trabalho contribui para aumento do custo de produo, fez com que os empresrios comecem a pensar como gerenciar e capacitar os trabalhadores de modo focado sobre as causas envolvidas. Da necessidade das empresas de buscarem a reduo e / ou eliminao de acidentes de trabalho. Considerando a ergonomia objetivando modificar os sistemas de trabalho para adequar a atividade existente s caractersticas, habilidades e limitaes das pessoas com vistas ao seu desempenho eficiente, confortvel e seguro, os empresrios consideram a aplicao da ergonomia, mesmo que incipiente

 1. Engenharia de produo. 3. Pesquisa operacional. I. Oliveira, Antonella Carvalho de. II. Ttulo. CDD-658.5 
Atena Editora Curitiba ? Brasil 2017
Capitulo XX pag 268 a 280
UM ENSAIO DE UM ALGORITMO PARA CRIPTOGRAFIA DE TEXTOS BASEADO NO CUBO RUBIK. UM MTODO PRTICO PARA USURIOS NO INICIADOS NA RESOLUO DO CUBO 
ABSTRACT
o presente trabalho prope um algoritmo para criptografia de textos, oferecendo uma soluo para codificao de mensagens de tamanho varivel, baseado em movimentos do Cubo Rubik. A soluo proposta se traduz em uma matriz de indexadores extrados das peas integrantes do cubo, cuja operao se baseia nas inmeras alternativas de movimentao da sua flexvel estrutura. Um template foi desenvolvido para correlacionar os indexadores associados ao algoritmo e usados para transposio do texto, em suas fases de criptografia e decriptografia, dispensando o uso fsico de um Cubo Rubik e simplificando o uso do mtodo proposto para usurios no familiarizados com tcnicas aplicadas para 
resoluo do cubo

UM ENSAIO DE UM ALGORITMO PARA CRIPTOGRAFIA DE TEXTOS BASEADO NO CUBO RUBIK. UM MTODO PRTICO PARA USURIOS NO INICIADOS NA RESOLUO DO CUBO 
ABSTRACT
o presente trabalho prope um algoritmo para criptografia de textos, oferecendo uma soluo para codificao de mensagens de tamanho varivel, baseado em movimentos do Cubo Rubik. A soluo proposta se traduz em uma matriz de indexadores extrados das peas integrantes do cubo, cuja operao se baseia nas inmeras alternativas de movimentao da sua flexvel estrutura. Um template foi desenvolvido para correlacionar os indexadores associados ao algoritmo e usados para transposio do texto, em suas fases de criptografia e decriptografia, dispensando o uso fsico de um Cubo Rubik e simplificando o uso do mtodo proposto para usurios no familiarizados com tcnicas aplicadas para 
resoluo do cubo

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO: The airplanes piloted autonomously: Is this the reality of today?
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-CAPITULO-DO-LIVRO-INGLES: The airplanes piloted autonomously: Is this the reality of today?

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: SHO2017 Proceedings Book
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: the School of Engineering of the University of Minho, the Engineering Faculty of University of Porto,
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: Taylor & Francis Group

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Taylor & Francis Group (submitted to be indexed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index, and Elsevier/Scopus). SHO2017 Proceedings Book" from SPOSHO, edited with ISBN.
Studies of aircrafts piloting techniques are progressively increasing the use of automated systems. The primary reason for this procedure is flight safety. Since the occurrence of the largest aircraft accident to date occurred in Tenerife in 1977 when two Boeing 747s collided with the ground, the dependence of the human pilot for the control of aircraft has been progressively reduced in the name of aviation safety. Even with all the contribution of computers in the piloting procedures, the participation of human beings is still fundamental in piloting. Aircraft accident investigations show that the participation of the human factor is the greater contributory factor than all others. On March 24, 2015 an airplane operated by flight 9525 of German Wings Airlines, co-pilot Andreas Gnter Lubitz locked the door and intentionally instructed the plane to collide with the terrain. Next, there was no shortage of commentaries on the future of piloted aviation. The planes are already very automated and it is a consensus that it will be a matter of time until pilots are unnecessary piloting components. The application of new technologies will be costly and cabins are not currently designed for a single person operation. This will be an expensive redesign on the planes. Currently a single person can not access all devices to fly the airplane and handle relevant data needed to make decisions. This is a question that the airline industry has had to face in the past when aircraft manufacturers decided to reduce the number of professionals in the cockpit from three to two professionals. This technological phenomenon alerts security scientists to possible adoption of technological measures that are not perfectly mature. It would not be the first time we would see this attitude taken in the name of pr

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: Taylor & Francis Group

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Taylor & Francis Group (submitted to be indexed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index, and Elsevier/Scopus). 
Pilots vehemently resent the process of gradually marginalizing their importance in the overall command of the aircraft and in the decisions made in the cockpit of modern aircraft. These command decisions to perform the flight are distributed between man and machine (computer / aircraft). The great differential of the way of acting is in the capacity of the recognition processing of qualitative information of the human, often not foreseen in computerized systems, unlike the computer with its great capacity to process a great quantity of data very fast and precise. A work of evaluation of the ergonomics distributed in the workstations in the new commercial airplanes increasingly emphasizes this phenomenon and are reflected in the health of the pilots and crews

DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.TITULO-DO-LIVRO: Engenharia de Produo: novas pesquisas e tendncias
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.ORGANIZADORES: Prof. Dr. Adriano Mesquita Soares
DETALHAMENTO-DO-CAPITULO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: aya editora

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
doi 1047573/aya.88580.2.39
Esta pesquisa demonstra como a influncia de situaes sistmicas, enquanto
senso comum previsvel, transcendem ao cenrio de risco na aviao, situando-se
to intimamente inseridas no cenrio profissional e pessoal de um piloto que no
podem estar dissociadas de seu comportamento operativo. Apresentamos como
estas situaes sistmicas podem interagir como vetores de reduo nas
habilidades ou cognio do piloto, resultando na eroso de sua competncia e
capacidade de conduzir aeronaves. Neste artigo demonstramos um mtodo para
anlise e tratamento dos fatores de risco e variveis correlacionadas com cenrios
de acidentes areos, atravs da percepo de um modelo matemtico para
sistemicamente sintetizar a reao das variveis envolvidas em ambientes crticos
na aviao.

rea do Conhecimento Engenharias

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The human appropriates the guidance based on objects as paradigm, as a great solution when you need to understand a particular context or situation. He always had a great seduction by figures, icons, signs, objects and pictorial symbolism. The object-oriented patterns emerged in order to improve efficiency in the development and communication quality. This context brought benefits such as better training of associative meanings, extensibility and broader level of abstraction. These factors led to rapid and extensive use of pictographs in the new interfaces in control cabins (cockpit), for data persistence of object-oriented applications. The main idea of object orientation is to let the closer the operating world of the real world. Modern aircraft are increasingly adopting this indicative format for all types of object-oriented information to indicate procedures for pilots in aircraft cabins and across which information and actions need to be explained to the crew members.

Thank you for checking your paper!	
published in:	A. Marcus (Ed.): DUXU 2014, Part III, LNCS 8519, pp. 317--325. Springer International Publishing Switzerland (2014)
to be 	April 23, 2014 23:59 GMTGuilt! : A word which disrupts accident investigations. In the scenario of aircraft with high degree of automation control which resembles computer consoles, point to the need for further research focused on possible conflicts between the "human logic" and "logical automation" checked in control systems for aircraft. 
It is very important to consider that the logic of automation was also drafted by pilots, so that this assumption is difficult to validate. A pilot in command of the Airbus blurted that "modern technology was withdrawing men of cockpits. This happened with the radio-telegraph when they got the new communication systems called SSB and VHF. But from there, the pilots were more burdened with the task of transmitting operational information and logistics companies, diluting attention at critical moments of the flight, in congested terminal areas. Also happened with the navigator when new systems arise like Omega and Doppler Radar. Over a sequence of operations adjustments and manipulations more equipment were transferred to the pilots on this occasion, adding to the known and the complex and overloaded duties of these professionals. This also happened with the mechanics of flight (the third man in the cockpit), when computers arrived. Until the 70s there was a work station flight engineer.

In the scenario of aircraft with high degree of automation control which resembles computer consoles, point to the need for further research focused on possible conflicts between the "human logic" and "logical automation" checked in control systems for aircraft. 
It is very important to consider that the logic of automation was also drafted by pilots, so that this assumption is difficult to validate. A pilot in command of the Airbus blurted that "modern technology was withdrawing men of cockpits. This happened with the radio-telegraph when they got the new communication systems called SSB and VHF. But from there, the pilots were more burdened with the task of transmitting operational information and logistics companies, diluting attention at critical moments of the flight, in congested terminal areas. Also happened with the navigator when new systems arise like Omega and Doppler Radar. DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: A lgica Fuzzi na operacionalizao de conhecimentos em interao de tarefas Humano-Computador em mquinas complexas: A aprendizagem em conjuntos de significncia.
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: A lgica Fuzzi na operacionalizao de conhecimentos em interao de tarefas Humano-Computador em mquinas complexas: A aprendizagem em conjuntos de significncia.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: As duas mquinas: Ser Humano e Computador, uma biolgica e outra mecnico/eletrnica precisam utilizar e operacionalizar suas lgicas naturais computacionais no compartilhamento das tarefas de controle de mquinas complexas. Os dois componentes (Ser Humano e Computador ) encarregados do controle e do funcionamento de mquinas complexas precisam aprender suas tarefas cada qual a seu modo. Podemos formular os questionamentos que sugerem toda diferena nos resultados operacionais: O formato do treinamento, os objetos de aprendizagem e o processo de capacitao esto corretos? A operacionalizao dos conhecimentos se mostra satisfatria? Este artigo faz uma anlise crtica dos processos de aprendizagem e da operacionalizao do trabalho conjunto destes dois componentes, onde supostamente a simbiose na distribuio de tarefas se prope a extrair as maiores vantagens de cada um. O grande diferencial do homem em relao ao computador se apresenta na grande capacidade de reconhecimento e processamento de informaes qualitativas do humano, muitas vezes no previstas nos sistemas computadorizados, diferentemente do computador com sua grande capacidade de processar uma grande quantidade de dados muito rpido e precisa.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Utilizado pelo autor e por outros mestrando da UFPE
O sub-sistema EDITOR adicionalmente produz grficos sobre quantidades e percentuais referenciados, para cada montagem selecionada, facilitando a viso dos valores correlacionados. V-se na figura 88 um exemplo de grfico para uma seleo de erros em fases do vo.
Crtica de dados no sistema Aviation DataBase
 De cada registro de acidente so extrados os cdigos referentes a cada grupo do algoritmo taxonmico (casualidades segundo a CENIPA, indcios de uma cadeia de erros segundo a FAA , fases do vo, tipo de visibilidade e outros dados que pode-se visualizar na figura 81 (pgina 186) correspondente tela de entrada de dados deste sistema que foi desenvolvido para apoiar a pesquisa. A seqncia de operaes para o tratamento e implantao de cada registro de acidente est descrito na figura 83 da pgina 186. 
Os dados so codificados segundo os grupos do algoritmo sem, contudo, altera-los. Houve preocupao em manter a integridade dos relatos, apenas codificando-os com preciso. O sistema critica os limites e valores dos cdigos e as duplicidades, evitando deformao na amostra pela entrada de registros j implantados. Muitos acidentes puderam ter mais de uma leitura, j que esto descritos em mais de um rgo oficial de controle, preveno e investigao de acidentes areos.Este procedimento serviu para conferir a integridade dos dados implantados.
O indicador de univocidade escolhido foi o prefixo da aeronave, j que este referencial nico para cada aparelho. O sistema contempla rotinas de segurana que regenera sistematicamente os ndices de acesso (indexadores) e realiza uma varredura de identificao de registros corrompidos pelo computador por problemas de arquivamento magntico ou tico.

O sub-sistema EDITOR adicionalmente produz grficos sobre quantidades e percentuais referenciados, para cada montagem selecionada, facilitando a viso dos valores correlacionados. V-se na figura 88 um exemplo de grfico para uma seleo de erros em fases do vo.
Crtica de dados no sistema Aviation DataBase
 De cada registro de acidente so extrados os cdigos referentes a cada grupo do algoritmo taxonmico (casualidades segundo a CENIPA, indcios de uma cadeia de erros segundo a FAA , fases do vo, tipo de visibilidade e outros dados que pode-se visualizar na figura 81 (pgina 186) correspondente tela de entrada de dados deste sistema que foi desenvolvido para apoiar a pesquisa. A seqncia de operaes para o tratamento e implantao de cada registro de acidente est descrito na figura 83 da pgina 186. 
Os dados so codificados segundo os grupos do algoritmo sem, contudo, altera-los. Houve preocupao em manter a integridade dos relatos, apenas codificando-os com preciso. O sistema critica os limites e valores dos cdigos e as duplicidades, evitando deformao na amostra pela entrada de registros j implantados. Muitos acidentes puderam ter mais de uma leitura, j que esto descritos em mais de um rgo oficial de controle, preveno e investigao de acidentes areos.Este procedimento serviu para conferir a integridade dos dados implantados.
O indicador de univocidade escolhido foi o prefixo da aeronave, j que este referencial nico para cada aparelho. O sistema contempla rotinas de segurana que regenera sistematicamente os ndices de acesso (indexadores) e realiza uma varredura de identificao de registros corrompidos pelo computador por problemas de arquivamento magntico ou tico.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Notas: No tomar medidas preventivas quando o prprio corpo gera sinais de alerta podem condicionar conseqncias srias para a sade e o trabalho. No incomum um comissrio de bordo entrar em pnico durante o vo, desmaiar ou no conseguir embarcar por alguma sensao desagradvel. Essas situaes, quando ocorrem, so delicadas e trazem grande sofrimento e angstia, alm de expor o funcionrio diante de seus colegas e de sua chefia. Na maioria das vezes, essas situaes poderiam ser evitadas se o aeronauta procurasse ajuda de forma preventiva, logo que notasse os primeiros sintomas. Nove em cada dez comissrios atendidos em situaes de emergncia como essas revelaram sintomas prvios que prenunciavam uma crise, mas preferiram testar at onde poderiam resistir sem recorrer a um tratamento. Por que ento as maiores causas de incapacidade para o trabalho segundo o CEMAL (Centro de Medicina Aeroespacial), rgo responsvel pelas percias mdicas dos aeronautas em nosso pas, eram os distrbios psiquitricos? Segundo Laurell e Noriega (1989), as cargas psquicas adquirem materialidade atravs da corporeidade

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO-TECNICO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-TECNICO: CONSTRUO DE UM MODELO DE REAO PARA TESTES DE VARIVEIS ENDGENAS UTILIZADAS PARA SITUAES DE RISCO NO CONTROLE DE MQUINAS COMPLEXAS.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O Projeto Inicial contemplou um Modelo de Reao (denominaremos SENSOR_R) suplementando a proposta descrita por Edgard Martins (2019) (denominada Proposta_R), para o Laboratrio de Segurana e Higiene do Trabalho - LSHT, Grupo de pesquisa Ergonomia, Higiene e Segurana do Trabalho, UFPE. A Proposta-R apresentou um estudo envolvendo condicionantes de risco de vo e variveis potencialmente causadoras de distrbios de sade fsica e mental entre aeronautas, onde causalidades podem ocorrer, decorrentes de falhas tcnico-psquicas. As variveis relacionam-se com hbitos de vida, incertezas da tecnologia embarcada nas modernas aeronaves, falta de rotina e horrios e o distanciamento da famlia, condies que contribuem sobremaneira para o aumento da vulnerabilidade e do risco aeronutico. O modelo SENSOR_R oferecer padres relacionados ao comportamento combinado dos fatores de vulnerabilidade aplicados a uma anlise acumulativa de riscos. Utilizaremos algoritmos de caminho mnimo para clculos e aproximao entre variveis de risco potencialmente envolvidas e redes semnticas para identificao de padres de clusterizao (modelo de Kohonen).

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Quebrando paradigmas tecnolgicos e culturais - O Design Sustentvel no transporte areo- O DIRIGVEL HBRIDO MULTIMISSO

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: II Simpsio Internacional de Design Sustentvel (ISSD)
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (Recife)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Desde as experincias bem sucedidas de vo do homem no final do sculo XIX que o transporte areo se afirmou como presena tecnolgica. O aerstato tem sido tratado como o ?Navio-do-ar? e foi mais adaptvel para transporte de passageiro e cargas, mesmo aps o aparecimento do mais pesado-que-o-ar. Na expanso do sistema virio nacional a opo pelo dirigvel resurge como melhor opo. Pases em desenvolvimento necessitam de um sistema de transporte moderno mas sofrem as limitaes dos recursos insuficientes para implant-lo como o Brasil. Com nossas dimenses continentais e carente de sistemas de transportes compatveis, o Dirigvel-Hbrido-Multimisso grande soluo e Ser o nico que complementar todos os outros tipos. Em 1982 um avio para 200 passageiros custava US$ 25.000.000; enquanto o Dirigvel custa metade ou menos, com mesma capacidade de carga. O preo dos derivados do petrleo so vetores que pressionam o mundo para emprego intensivo do transporte quase extinto no ltimo sculo. Condies climticas favorveis permitem operao ininterrupta no ano com vantagens econmicas e alta taxa de retorno de investimentos. A crise energtica elege o dirigvel, como alternativa limpa, barata, atendendo exigncias do espao geofsico e potencialidades naturais do Brasil apoiadas em boas prticas sustentveis no meio ambiente.

DOI 10.1007/978-3-642-39238-2
Print ISBN 978-3-642-39237-5
Online ISBN 978-3-642-39238-2
***********************************************
Since the successful experiences of the human being for flying since the late nineteenth century, the Air Transport has established itself like a technological presence. The aerostat has been treated as the "ship-to-air" and has been more adaptable to transport of passengers and cargo, even after the appearance of heavier-than-air. In expanding of road systems, the option for airship resurges like the best option. The Blimp-Hybrid-Multimission is the great solution as the best and single complement than all other types. In 1982 an airplane for 200 passengers costs U.S. $25 million, while the Airship should cost half or less, with the same load capacity. The price of oil derivatives are vectors that push the world for employment-intensive transport almost extinct in the last century. Favorable weather and conditions, in many places of the world, allow uninterrupted operation almost all the year with economic advantages and high rate of return on investments.

Print ISBN 978-3-642-39237-5
Online ISBN 978-3-642-39238-2
***********************************************
All the official records of aircraft accidents investigated by official preventing and detecting agencies always has concluded that the human as guilty or as a major component in accidents, 
 Few people still believe that mind, thought and brain are independent things. We are what generates the brain, and we understand the world the way the brain can sense what's around us, particularly according to the way we can extract information about us. The feelings, moods and emotions have effects on the central nervous system and the responses in the mechanisms regulating this perception. The feelings, emotions and moods have a huge influence on memory.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Distance Education Environments: An Ergonomic Vision
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Distance Education Environments: An Ergonomic Vision

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM SAFERY AND HYGIENE -SHO 2014
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: SOCIEDADE PORTUGUESA DE SEGURANA E HIGIENE

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Comparative studies aim to identify, describe and evaluate conceptual and technological innovations focused on the continuous training of students with emphasis on distance education methodologies and tools. The learning process in web-based instructional models becomes a complex commitment to educator, just as the blackboard and the chalk paradigm had been in the past, when the blackboard and chalk were deemed the formal means of transfer of knowledge between the professor and the student in the traditional school environment. Breaking this paradigm is just the initial step to accept the "Invisible School" and the "remote" teacher, who can be "turned on and off" by the students, according to their time constraints and learning conveniences, which are as flexible as the selection of roadmaps on the development of the curriculum frameworks of what should be learned, and where to learn, with whom to learn and when to learn. Some Distance Education environments are being designed by web-designers and html language programmers, and it is expected that the final product, besides presenting a friendly interface and pleasant visual, can also present a pedagogical environment and ergonomic relationships with its users

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Subjective concepts of probability permeate and guide our thoughts and actions. This study provides an assessment of the degree of confidence that, in law, we can have about the truth of some proposition or the occurrence of certain events, which respondent can influence and distort the record of facts reported, based on the subjective judgment of quantifications. Diversification in the form of describing an event, as well as their interpretation depends on previous concepts, experiences and culture of the interlocutors involved. The subjective probability also occupies a prominent place in reporting events, accidents and reports of criminal activities.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Modern machines: How to set up the health of the pilot?

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM SAFERY AND HYGIENE -SHO 2014
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: SOCIEDADE PORTUGUESA DE SEGURANA E HIGIENE

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The flaws in the commitment of decision-making in emergency situations and the lack of perception related to all elements associated with a given situation in a short space of time indicate, often, lack of situational awareness. Automation always surprises the crews and often prevents them from understanding the extent of this technology that is very common in
aircraft units with a high degree of automation. These facts are discussed in a subtle way by aircraft drivers who can not do it openly, as it might create an impression of professional self-worthlessness (self-deprecation). This leads to common questions like: What is happening now? What will be the next step of automated systems? This type of doubt would be inadmissible in older aircraft because the pilot of those machines works as an extension of the plane. This scenario contributes to emotional disorders and a growing hidden problem in the aeronautical field. These unexpected automation surprises reflect a complete misunderstanding or even the misinformation of the users. It also reveals their inability and limitations to overcome these new situations that were not foreseen by the aircraft designers. Our studies showed a different scenario when the accident is correlated
with systemic variables. It has identified the problems or errors that contribute to the fact that drivers are unable to act properly. These vectors, when they come together, may generate eventually a temporary incompetence of the pilot due to limited capacity
or lack of training in the appropriateness of automation in aircraft or even, the worst alternative, due to a personal not visible and not detectable non-adaptation to automation. We must also consider in the analysis the inadequate training and many other
reasons, so that we can put in right proportion the effective participation or culpability of the pilot in accidents. Our doctoral thesis presents statistical studies that allow us to assert that the emotional and cognitive ove

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM SAFERY AND HYGIENE -SHO 2014
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: SOCIEDADE PORTUGUESA DE SEGURANA E HIGIENE

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
As aeronaves modernas utilizam computadores e sistemas digitais em larga escala. Os preceitos que disciplinam a interao e interfaces entre o homem tm uma grande importncia para os aspectos de segurana e preveno de acidentes, pois destas tcnicas dependero a perfeita compreenso e interpretao das mensagens tratadas pelos computadores e pela tripulao dos avies para pilotar estas mquinas. Sendo o design da informao definido como a arte e a cincia de preparar informao para que esta possa ser utilizada por seres humanos com facilidade e conforto, enfocamos a tarefa relacionada com o uso referenciais documentados chamados checklists, que so parte integrante de inspees e analise do cumprimento de seqncias de tarefas pelas tripulaes, durante varias fases do vo de aeronaves e em especial, em situaes de emergncia. Como o que distingue o design da informao de outras reas do design so a eficcia e a eficincia no cumprimento do objetivo comunicacional, os preceitos para a gesto da informao na complexa sociedade atual requerem sofisticados equipamentos de comunicao e redes computadorizadas que operam em um nvel crescente desta eficincia e de eficcia . O simples armazenamento de grandes quantidades de informao j no satisfaz as nossas necessidades informacionais No necessitamos de mais informao, mas apresentar a informao correta s pessoas certas, no momento certo e na forma mais eficaz e eficiente. Toda informao deve aparecer em local visvel ao usurio a que se destina (considerando o campo de viso e leitura confortvel).
Os designers de cockpits adotam em algumas aeronaves mais modernas estes checklists no formato eletrnico nos painis computadorizados das novssimas cabines como soluo natural dos recursos tecnolgicos disponveis. Mas devemos considerar vrios aspectos para uso de referenciais j histrica e amplamente funcionais quando pensamos em modificarmos seus formatos apenas pela razo da tecnologia disponvel.

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 14	Congresso de Stress da ISMA-BR
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: American Institute of Stress (AIS) Departamento de Psicologia (PUCRS) Escola de Enfermagem (UFRGS) International Stress Management Association (ISMA-USA) Unisinos Universidade Federal de So Carlos (UFSCar) Universidade Positivo (UP)
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.LOCAL-DA-APRESENTACAO: Centro de Eventos Plaza So Rafael

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Os sistemas automatizados tm deixado os pilotos em situao de risco algumas vezes por no saberem que atitudes os controles automticos esto tomando em certos momentos, pois, sob o ponto de vista da ergonomia, os modelos mentais destes usurios, tem tomado diferentes configuraes com o avano da tecnologia. Uma discusso sobre dispositivos automticos, no meio aeronutico versa o desagrado dos pilotos apontando para a experincia destes profissionais, no representarem a figura do ?piloto real? nestas aeronaves automatizadas. Este tipo de experincia negando a seres humanos a oportunidade de exercitarem suas verdadeiras capacidades estressante e destrutiva ao senso profissional. Muitos pilotos no gostam dos avies da nova famlia Airbus devido ao uso ?join-stick? de comando em detrimento do manche tradicional [1]. Estas aeronaves perderam completamente o aspecto humanizado que tem apagado a paixo pela arte de voar dos pilotos, visto que, no Boeing, pareceria embaraoso a importncia de permitir a pilotos a experincia da mgica de voar com seu B777. Como um piloto A320 (Airbus) confidenciou uma vez a um dos diretores da FAA (Federal Aviation Administration): "no h nenhum vo mgico um A320, quando todo o procedimento como uma experincia vazia?. Toda a linha area que tender a migrar para uma porcentagem substancial de seus pilotos com essa atitude, estar tendendo a ter srios problemas futuros porque o piloto complacente um piloto perigoso. Um trabalho exploratrio desenvolvido em para estudos exploratrios de nossa monografia para obteno de grau de mestre e subseqente desenvolvimento da nossa tese de doutorado

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A criao do Sentido na comunicao uma atividade negociada, fruto da construo que nasce da interao entre sujeitos. O sentido no imanente relao entre as palavras, sinais e smbolos que surgem de uma negociao necessria e incontornvel. Assim como as concepes de sentido, as representaes estticas e discretas implicam em uma noo de computao clssica e em uma viso de sistema cognitivo correspondentes. O sentido de uma construo situada e partilhada entre agentes contextualizam noes de computao e de cognio diferentes. Vrios esforos tm sido desenvolvidos para responder a essas demandas, como, por exemplo, o Conexionismo (tambm conhecido como Redes Neurais. Registros sobre aspectos da sade mental e estresse dos profissionais de vo esto presentes nos relatrios oficiais dos rgos de investigao de acidentes de aviao em todo o mundo desde os seus primrdios. Problemas relacionados com sade fsica e mental dos pilotos (fadiga, estresse, problemas fisiolgicos e psicossociais) correspondem a 19% dos fatores causais envolvidos nos acidentes com aeronaves.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The reading of information in a book replaced by the reading on a display represents the mere replacement of the boredom of reading books by reading on video. The constructivist philosophy of learning defines the cognitive process as the internal construction of the knowledge in terms of long-term memory, with the personal knowledge built through experience and interaction with the world, which he called active learning. Upon replacing the traditional technology of the "Computer-Teacher" binominal, where human contact is lost, students are isolated and the educational experience is passive, limited and alienated by environments where the WEB represents the means of interaction, enabling research and consultation of information and interaction with tutors and fellow students. The role of the teacher and inflexible rigid teaching methods has been questioned by educators who advocate cooperative learning, as opposed to the dictatorship of tax knowledge, practiced by traditionalists who believe that teaching authority, and assimilation of knowledge for apprentices are necessarily two sides of the same coin

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: WORLDCOMP'14 - The 2014 World Congress in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, and Applied Computing
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: The 2014 International Conference on e-Learning, e-Business, Enterprise Information Systems, and e-Government (EEE'14)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A method for classifying subgroups known as as self-organizing maps is used to study organizational information settings, applying unsupervised classification techniques of data through a tool that use principles of neural networks. This method use unorganized data entry, not knowing possible classes or organizational standards relating to selected data. One of these methods is called SOM - Self Organized Maps applying algorithms auto unsupervised learning, where neurons compete for the discovery of input patterns in a method known as Competitive Learning, a form of learning where the set of input patterns is partitioned into specific groups constituting a simplified form called "Winner takes all".
The objective of this algorithm, geared towards self-organized learning is to discover significant patterns or features in the input data, developing discoveries without the aid of a teacher. To foster learning, the algorithm has a set of rules of a local nature, which enable learning to calculate an input-output mapping with specific desirable properties. The word "local" means that the synaptic weight of a neuron is limited to the immediate neighborhood of that neuron. The learning process goes repeatedly modifying the synaptic weights of a neural network connections in response to activation patterns, meeting the pre-established rules, to develop a final configuration for the selected sample.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: SPOLM - XVII Simpsio de Pesquisa Operacional e Logstica da Marinha
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: ITA- Centro de Anlises de Sistemas Navais (CASNAV) - MARINHA DO BRASIL
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.LOCAL-DA-APRESENTACAO: Escola superior de guerra- Praia Vermelha- rio de janeiro

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Em sua 17 edio, o Simpsio de Pesquisa Operacional e Logstica da Marinha (SPOLM), aconteceu nos dias 06 e 07 de agosto, na Escola de Guerra Naval, no Rio de Janeiro. Este ano teve como tema "Amaznia Azul: A Pesquisa Operacional na Busca da Eficincia Logstica para Explorao das Riquezas do Pr-sal". A grade de programao do evento contou com palestras, workshops, mesas redondas, minicursos e apresentao de artigos aceitos. 
O Simpsio foi organizado pelo Centro de Anlises de Sistemas Navais (CASNAV) e j fez parte do calendrio de eventos acadmicos do Rio de Janeiro, sendo considerado um dos mais importantes encontros de Pesquisa Operacional e Logstica do Pas. O SPOLM reuniu, cerca de mil participantes dos setores acadmico, militar, iniciativa privada, rgos do governo e do setor produtivo de bens e servios.

************************
Este ensaio oferece uma classificao da violncia nas capitais brasileiras, tratando ndices de homicdios relacionados com a populao, agrupando os resultados processados por meio de redes neurais. Os dados-fonte compreendem indicadores de homicdios por 100.000 mil habitantes, referentes s capitais brasileiras, editados pelo Ministrio da Sade (ano 2000) e os ndices demogrficos divulgados pelo IBGE (ano 2003). A viso final do estudo ser o resultado do tratamento das variveis processadas via rede neural, utilizando uma arquitetura SOM (Self Organized Method) Aprendizado Competitivo, agrupando as capitais em quatro clusters. Foi desenvolvido um mtodo para extrao de amostras organizacionais plotadas em espao trigonomtrico, complementado por algoritmo de classificao de estruturas que utilizam modelos de redes neurais com aprendizado no supervisionado SOM

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: As duas mquinas: Ser Humano e Computador, uma biolgica e outra mecnico/eletrnica precisam utilizar e operacionalizar suas lgicas naturais computacionais no compartilhamento das tarefas de controle de mquinas complexas. Os dois componentes (Ser Humano e Computador ) encarregados do controle e do funcionamento de mquinas complexas precisam aprender suas tarefas cada qual a seu modo. Podemo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: As duas mquinas: Ser Humano e Computador, uma biolgica e outra mecnico/eletrnica precisam utilizar e operacionalizar suas lgicas naturais computacionais no compartilhamento das tarefas de controle de mquinas complexas. Os dois componentes (Ser Humano e Computador ) encarregados do controle e do funcionamento de mquinas complexas precisam aprender suas tarefas cada qual a seu modo. Podemos formular os questionamentos que sugerem toda diferena nos resultados operacionais: O formato do treinamento, os objetos de aprendizagem e o processo de capacitao esto corretos? A operacionalizao dos conhecimentos se mostra satisfatria? Este artigo faz uma anlise crtica dos processos de aprendizagem e da operacionalizao do trabalho conjunto destes dois componentes, onde supostamente a simbiose na distribuio de tarefas se prope a extrair as maiores vantagens de cada um. O grande diferencial do homem em relao ao computador se apresenta na grande capacidade de reconhecimento e processamento de informaes qualitativas do humano, muitas vezes no previstas nos sistemas computadorizados, diferentemente do computador com sua grande capacidade de processar uma grande quantidade de dados muito rpido e precisa.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Training standards in manual flying skills may have deteriorated, but are these some changes in the tasks and scenery on typical of modern operations even in the reality at the spirit of handling related safety con-cerns. The organisation of the economic and the social changes have changed the baseline human behaviour that has been affected by these. Modern views of human factors by-pass human error with the concept of variability; this is a performance characteristic necessary to manage daily activities. No situation is perfect / clear cut, work activity is a compromise. So one aspect to consider is if pilots are sufficiently trained / skilled in the process of compromise ? the judgement that originates from situation assessment and choice of action (aspects of airmanship), and which also involves risk management, and the skills of thought when stressed.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A history of aircraft can mean loss of life if there is any issue that was not previously detected by a thorough assessment tool, efficient, continuous and complete, based on technical and ergonomic criteria. Thus, it can be taken as an example, the Brazilian government takeover of the Argentine airline Aero Boero AB-115 (Figure 1), based on criteria that were not considered all the technical aspects as determinants for use by all national aero clubs. The choice of an aircraft can not be regarded merely subjective or political criteria. In addition AeroBoero AB-115, we have two other examples of training aircraft used in Brazilian air clubs: Neiva Paulistinha P-56 (Figure 2) and Cessna 150 (Figure 3). The latter, unlike the former, has a reputation in the aviation environment as performing well in terms of safety, performance and applicability in basic training area pilots

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The human appropriates the guidance based on objects as paradigm, as a great solution when you need to understand a particular context or situation. He always had a great seduction by figures, icons, signs, objects and pictorial symbolism. The object-oriented patterns emerged in order to improve efficiency in the development and communication quality. This context brought benefits such as better training of associative meanings, extensibility and broader level of abstraction. These factors led to rapid and extensive use of pictographs in the new interfaces in control cabins (cockpit), for data persistence of object-oriented applications. The main idea of object orientation is to let the closer the operating world of the real world. Modern aircraft are increasingly adopting this indicative format for all types of object-oriented information to indicate procedures for pilots in aircraft cabins and across which information and actions need to be explained to the crew members.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Develop housing projects, leisure and work has been a major feature in the specialized tasks of ergonomics. Some of the basic human characteristics are associated with the size and range of motion of various parts of your body. Ergonomics is aware of these features work in aircraft design and accommodation of passengers environments that have very different physical characteristics. Adopt adjustments solutions in aircraft seats exacerbates the challenge of responsibility to ergonomically design these complex artifacts. Not always the providences for accessibility are synchronized to safety. For example, the huge doors of access for large aircraft, designed for loading and unloading very fast loads, have caused situations where the lock is not perfect and therefore, there have been accidents. The design of many aircraft equipment uses the dimensions of the male human-being: life jackets, emergency exits, oxygen masks, snack service cart, bathroom sinks, belts and so on, because after all the human is its purpose. On-site installation of these devices, knowledge of the size, weight, users of the scale is needed to determine accessibility.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: ABSTRACT: Pilots vehemently resent the process of gradually marginalizing their importance in the overall command of the aircraft and in the decisions made in the cockpit of modern aircraft. These command decisions to perform the flight are distributed between man and machine (computer / aircraft). The great differential of the way of acting is in the capacity of the recognition processing of qualitative information of the human, often not foreseen in computerized systems, unlike the computer with its great capacity to process a great quantity of data very fast and precise. A work of evaluation of the ergonomics distributed in the workstations in the new commercial airplanes increasingly emphasizes this phenomenon and are reflected in the health of the pilots and crews

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: scheduled to make the flight between Barcelona, Spain and Dsseldorf, Germany. , The copilot was left alone in the cockpit, locked the door and intentionally, changed the autopilot's programming to instruct the plane to reduce its altitude until it collided with the terrain. In May 2015, the BEA published a preliminary report resulting from the investigations where co-pilot Andreas Gnter Lubitz, age 32, born in Germany was appointed as the person responsible for the accident, deliberately operating controls to modify speed and reduce the airplane's altitude. In the two weeks since the crash of German Wings, there was no lack of comment on the flaws and future of piloted aviation. The planes are already much automated and the consensus is that it will only be a matter of time before the pilots are completely unnecessary piloting components. And this is not the best way to avoid another Andreas Lubitz and replacing him for a computer, or even for a remote pilot, somewhere on the ground? A theoretical aeronautical professor or university scientist will respond quickly: ?yes, we are well on our way to a future without pilot in modern aircraft cockpits?. Applying new technologies will be extraordinarily onerous for airlines. Cockpits today are not designed for a single person operation. This means that in addition to the difficulty with insurers and unions, airlines would have to commit to a costly redesign of all their airplanes. In the current configuration of aircraft cockpits, a single person can not access all the buttons to fly the airplane or control all the relevant screens and data needed to make decisions. However, this is an issue that the airline industry has had to face in the past. Almost 50 years ago, unions strongly protested when aircraft manufacturers decided to reduce the number of professionals in the cockpit from three people to two professionals.

However, this is an issue that the airline industry has had to face in the past. Almost 50 years ago, unions strongly protested when aircraft manufacturers decided to reduce the number of professionals in the cockpit from three people to two professionals.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: 'Ensaio de um Modelo Ampliado de Criptografia Utilizando Multiplos Cubos Rubik. Aplicao para Usurios no Iniciados na Soluo do Cubo'

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: The 9th International Multi-Conference on Complexity, Informatics, and Cybernetics: IMCIC 2018 Congresso Informtica y Ciberntica en Ciencia e Ingeniera
DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: INTERNATIONAL INSTITUTE OF INFORMATIC AND SYSTEMIC

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The 9th International Multi-Conference on Complexity, Informatics, and Cybernetics: IMCIC 2018
13750 WEST COLONIAL DR , 350 WINTERGARDEN FLORIDA, 37787, USA 
Este ensaio apresenta uma evoluo de nosso modelo inicial, ampliando o objeto usado para base criptogrfica, atravs de mltiplos cubos, que permitiu ampliao de seu potencial e capacidade de suportar mensagens longas, anteriormente limitadas s dimenses de apenas um nico Cubo. Propomos um mtodo sinttico que substitui os cubos Rubik, facilitando a utilizao do sistema de criptografia por usurios no iniciados, conservando entretando os seus princpios matemticos. O modelo demonstrou-se resistente ao ataque sistemtico desenvolvido em laboratrio de decriptografia, onde foi usada fora bruta com objetivo da recuperao de textos claros codificados pelo mtodo proposto no ensaio.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
The 9th International Multi-Conference on Complexity, Informatics, and Cybernetics: IMCIC 2018
13750 WEST COLONIAL DR , 350 WINTERGARDEN FLORIDA, 37787, USA

O modelo demonstrou-se resistente ao ataque sistemtico desenvolvido em laboratrio de decriptografia, onde foi usada fora bruta com objetivo da recuperao de textos claros codificados pelo mtodo proposto no ensaio.
